name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Heal an ally 200+ health.
name: Low Heal

description:
Attack twice randomly, dealing 120% damage per hit.
Ignores defense slightly.
name: Double Attack

description:
Attack 3 times randomly, dealing 140% damage per hit.
Ignores moderate amount of defense.
name: Triple Attack

description: Heal an ally 500+ health.
name: Small Heal

description: Lay 2 eggs, up to 8 stacks max.
name: Egg Lay

description:
Shoot 4 eggs at an enemy, dealing high damage.
Slightly ignores defense.
name: Egg Burst

description: Lay an egg, no TP cost.
name: Egg Lay - Counter
note:
<Custom Execution>
a.adjustSR(12, 1)
</Custom Execution>
<Counter Name: Egg Lay>

description:
Choose an ally to increase agility by +30%.
The ally will also recover MP every turn.
name: Rally

description: Increase defense of an ally.
name: Bacon Defense

description:
Greatly increase aggro and double defense this turn.
This skill will perform before enemies.
name: Bacon Taunt

description: Party takes less damage for 1 hit.
name: Fluff Guard

description:
Chance to stun target with high chance to miss.
No effect if target acts before you.
name: Ram

description: Attack all enemies for 150% damage, slightly piercing defense.
name: AoE Attack

description: Attack all enemies for 140% magic damage and reduce 10% MP from them.
name: AoE MP Reduction

description: Decrease agility of an enemy.
name: Wrap

description:
Enemy only, recovers some MP.
Basically skips a turn.
name: Enemy Recover MP

description:
Attack for 120% damage and lower the enemy's defense.
Slightly pierces defense.
name: Bite

description: Heal the party 100+ health.
name: Low Party Heal

description:
Increase attack of an ally and slightly heal them.
Removes all attack debuffs beforehand.
name: Encourage

description: Attack for 180% damage, pierces moderate defense.
name: Power Shot

description:
Decrease attack of an enemy.
Not guaranteed against bosses.
name: Fear

description:
Removes all debuffs from an ally and slightly heals them.
Does not removes statuses like poison.
name: Cleanse

description: Increases your attack, but lowers your agility.
name: Reload

description: Increases your agility.
name: Speed Up

description: Attack everyone for 100% damage, multiplied by your agility over theirs.
name: Enemy Whirlwind

description: Chance to attack everyone for 50% magic damage and decrease their defense.
name: Screech

description:
Attack 4 times, dealing 50% damage per hit.
Pierces moderate defense.
name: Trample

description:
Increases attack, but decreases defense.
Grants an extra action.
name: Aggression

description: Attack everyone for 50% damage with chance to apply trip.
name: Enemy Stomp

description: Attack everyone for 300% damage and skip next turn.
name: Enemy Super Groundpound

description: Increase defense of all allies.
name: Bacon Defense+

description: Gain a shield equal to 25% MAXHP for 3 turns.
name: Bacon Absorption
note:
<Custom User Barrier 3 Turns>
value = user.mhp * 0.25;
</Custom User Barrier 3 Turns>

description:
Attack twice, dealing 120% damage per hit.
Ignores defense slightly.
name: Double Attack+

description:
Attack 3 times, dealing 140% damage per hit.
Ignores moderate amount of defense.
name: Triple Attack+

description: All allies gain a shield equal to 30% MAXHP for 2 turns.
name: Fluff Absorption
note:
<Custom Target Barrier 2 Turns>
value = target.mhp * 0.30;
</Custom Target Barrier 2 Turns>
<Cooldown: 4>
<Limit Uses: 5>

description:
Attack for 140% magic damage with chance of poison.

name: Poison Fangs

description: Increases your magic attack.
name: Focus

description:
Attack for 140% magic damage and decrease magic attack.
Pierces slight magic defense.
name: Magic Sap

description: Attack for 140% magic damage and reduce 30% MP from them.
name: MP Reduction

description: Attack for 120% magic damage with chance to apply burn.
name: Fire

description: Attack twice randomly for 140% magic damage per hit with chance to apply burn.
name: Double Fire

description: Attack 3 times randomly for 140% magic damage per hit with chance to apply burn.
name: Triple Fire

description: Attack all enemies for 140% magic damage with chance to apply burn.
name: AoE Fire

description: Increase chance to hit targets and crit.
name: Concentrate

description:
Attack dealing 120% damage then guard.
Ignores defense slightly.
name: Riposte

description:
Shoot eggs at all enemies once, dealing high damage.
Slightly ignores defense.
name: Egg Spread

description:
Shoot 6 eggs at an enemy, dealing very high damage.
Moderately ignores defense.
name: Egg Burst+

description: Increase attack and greatly increase agility.
name: Blood Enhance

description:
Attack dealing 180% damage.
Pierces moderate defense.
name: Blood Bite

description: Heal 75% MAXHP over 5 turns.
name: Blood Regeneration

description: Attack for 100% damage, multiplied by your agility over theirs.
name: Speed Attack

description: Attack for 120% magic damage and decrease agility.
name: Slowing Attack

description: Attack for 140% magic damage and decrease magic defense.
name: Spit

description: Attack for 100% damage and mummifies the enemy.
name: Enemy Mummification

description: Inflict curse status on the enemy.
name: Curse

description:
Attack for 140% magic damage with chance of poison.
Pierces moderate magic defense.
name: Poison Shot

description:
Infest an ally and deal 50% magic damage.
Increases attack and magic attack.
name: Infest Ally

description:
Attack and deal 50% magic damage.
Decreases defense and magic defense.
name: Infest Enemy

description: Party heals 400 HP.
name: Low Health Splash Vial Bundle

description: Increase party attack.
name: Strength Splash Vial Bundle

description: Increase party defense.
name: Resistance Splash Vial Bundle

description: Increase party magic attack.
name: Arcane Splash Vial Bundle

description: Increase party magic defense.
name: Resilence Defense Splash Vial Bundle

description: Increase party agility.
name: Speed Splash Vial Bundle

description: Increase party luck.
name: Luck Splash Vial Bundle

description: Party heals 800 HP.
name: Small Health Splash Vial Bundle

description:
Attack dealing 140% damage with chance of bleed.
Slightly pierces defense.
name: Bleed Attack

description:
Attack twice randomly dealing 120% damage with chance of bleed.
Slightly pierces defense.
name: Double Bleed Attack

description:
Attack 3 times randomly dealing 140% damage with chance of bleed.
Slightly pierces defense.
name: Triple Bleed Attack

description: Prepares the enemy's ultimate for next action.
name: Enemy Prepare

description:
Attack everyone 40 times dealing 10% damage.
Each hit has a tiny chance to decrease defense.
name: Enemy Rampage
note:
<Repeat: 40>

<After Eval>
  user.addState(20);
  user.removeState(18);
</After Eval>

<Post-Damage Eval>
var chance = 0.05;
var paramId = 3;
var duration = 1;

if (target._buffs[paramId] > -2) {
  if (Math.random() < chance) {
    target.addDebuff(paramId, duration);
  }
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

description:
Greatly increase defense of an ally.
Removes all defense debuffs beforehand.
name: Bacon Defense Max

description:
Greatly increase defense of all allies.
Removes all defense debuffs beforehand.
name: Bacon Defense Max+

description: Recover MP% based on missing HP%.
name: Recover MP

description:
Revive an ally for 25% of their MAXHP.
Grants you and that ally an extra action.
name: Undead Revival

description: Lay 3 eggs, up to 8 stacks max.
name: Egg Lay+

description:
Lay 1 egg, up to 8 stacks max.
Grants an extra action.
name: Quick Lay

description:
Attack for 120% magic damage and decrease agility.

name: Frost Attack

description:
Attack for 120% magic damage and decrease agility.

name: Frost Shot

name: Frost Guard

name: Freeze

name: Enemy Instant Freeze

Attack for 140% damage with chance to apply burn.

name: Enemy Debuff Enemies
